heading: Today
text: Early snow showers, mostly south and northeast, giving way to sun. Clouds south spreading north this afternoon, with snow increasing in NY, spreading into VT late. Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, 20s in the Champlain Valley and south.  Light winds becoming southwest 10 to 15 mph, some gusts to 25 mph this afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Occasional snow, 1 to 3 inches, less in a few southern valleys, over 4 inches over higher elevations.  Lows in the single numbers north, and teens south.  Winds south near 10 mph, becoming light after midnight.

heading: New Years Eve
text: Occasional snow, 1 to 3 inches, less in a few southern valleys, over 4 inches over higher elevations.  Lows in the single numbers north, and teens south.  Winds south near 10 mph, becoming light after midnight.

heading: Thursday
text: Morning snow from western VT east, up to an inch, then increasing periods of sun, last northeast.  Blustery and quite cold.  Highs only single numbers to low teens north, upper teens and 20s south, steady or falling.  Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: New Years Day
text: Morning snow from western VT east, up to an inch, then increasing periods of sun, last northeast.  Blustery and quite cold.  Highs only single numbers to low teens north, upper teens and 20s south, steady or falling.  Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.
